text:
Stories, poems, legends or myths have always been shared by oral exchanges. Humans have also drawn on rocks and on their own bodies to share their culture and traditions. But in every cases, before the personnal book breakthrougth comes out, conversations and shows permitted people to transcend their ideas. Poems were telled by parents to childrens, history like the Bible were teached in a religion process, and the few books written were shared between people.
Then, thanks to printer, people could acces to a book for themselves. Things changed and reading book alone at home became possible. From a social pratice, sharing became possible being solo. With that, the number of people who know how to read and write increased and personnal books scaled in the world. So, anybody who could and wanted to write a part of their personnal history, a brand new story or whatever, could be share with anybody who know how to read.
Nowadays, almost every people which received an education know how to read and write. With the arrival of internet, social media and stuff like that, people's story can travel the entire globe. Communication has evolved all along human's creations. However, relations between humans have not followed the same path, but took a different one. With all the tools around us, we now communicate differently than before. People migth spend more time alone because there are now so much to do alone. Entertainment, sharing or learning are at the time both social and personnal activities. With all the pros and cons each breakthrougths bring to us, it's always how it is used that matter. It's always a matter of balance.
